trans-unit.source: Represents the configuration settings for validating an X.509 certificate.
trans-unit.target: Representerer konfigurasjonsinnstillingene for validering av et X.509-sertifikat.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Configuration.CertificateReferenceElement"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Configuration.CertificateReferenceElement"> </xref> klasse.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a string that specifies the value to search for in the X.509 certificate store.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en streng som angir verdien til å søke etter i X.509 sertifikatlageret.

trans-unit.source: The type contained in this property must satisfy the requirements of the specified <xref:System.ServiceModel.Configuration.CertificateReferenceElement.X509FindType%2A> value.
trans-unit.target: Typen som finnes i denne egenskapen må oppfylle kravene til den angitte <xref:System.ServiceModel.Configuration.CertificateReferenceElement.X509FindType%2A>verdi.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Configuration.CertificateReferenceElement.X509FindType%2A>

trans-unit.source: The default is an empty string.
The value to search for in the X.509 certificate store.
trans-unit.target: Verdien til å søke etter i X.509 sertifikatlageret.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a boolean value that specifies whether the validation is done using a certificate chain.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en boolsk verdi som angir om valideringen gjøres ved hjelp av en sertifikatkjede.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if a certificate chain is used in validation; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis en sertifikatkjede brukes i validering; Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that specifies the location of the certificate store the client can use to validate the server’s certificate.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en verdi som angir plasseringen av sertifikatlageret klienten kan bruke til å validere serversertifikatet.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.StoreLocation"></xref> that specifies the location of the certificate store the client can use to validate the server’s certificate.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.StoreLocation"> </xref> som angir plasseringen til sertifikatlageret klienten kan bruke til å validere serversertifikatet.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the name of the X.509 certificate store to open.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir navnet på X.509 sertifikatlageret til å åpne.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.StoreName"></xref> that contains the name of the X.509 certificate store to open.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.StoreName"> </xref> som inneholder navnet på X.509 sertifikatlageret til å åpne.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the type of X.509 search to be executed.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir typen X.509 søk kjøres.

trans-unit.source: The type contained in <xref:System.ServiceModel.Configuration.CertificateReferenceElement.FindValue%2A> must satisfy the requirements of this property.
An <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509FindType"></xref> that contains the type of X.509 search to be executed.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509FindType"> </xref> som inneholder typen X.509 søk kjøres.
